body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Edward Turner and the customer's name is Samantha Foster.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to Pawn Masters! My name is Edward Turner, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Samantha! How can I help you with our services today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some items I'd like to pawn, but I'm concerned about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, privacy is very important to us. Can I ask you for your phone number to start the process?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two zero three, five six seven, eight nine zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Samantha! And could you also provide your address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one hundred twenty three Maple Street, Apartment four B.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Rest assured, your privacy is our priority, and your details will be kept confidential.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Edward. It really puts my mind at ease.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Samantha! Thank you for your time today. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Edward!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a great day!
